text:
@realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom Mr. Trump, Sir...
What is this: HR 6666?
It's NOT ANYTHING GOOD! THEY ARE TRYING TO TAKE OUR FREEDOM FROM US AMERICANS.
STOP THIS PLEASE!! May 1, 2020. Text for H.R.6666 - 116th Congress (2019-2020):
COVID-19 Testing, Reaching, And Contacting Everyone ..??????
Don't allow this!
